page.title: 08ALL SAINTS AND THE POLY
page.content: difficulty in getting to school sometimes because of the deep snow. The parents'and Teachers' Association works hard for the school.It has provided lots of toys for the nursery,and a hi-fi set,and a climbing frame for the older children. { {SHEFFIELD CITY POLYTECHNIC,TOTLEY {SITE.}On the site of{Totley Hall, built in 1625,{Totley Hall College of {Domestic Science}was built in 1948.It was extended and expanded into Sheffield City College of Education in 1960 and became part of the {Polytechnic}in 1976.The departments of English,Modern Languages,History, Community Studies,Management and Home Economics are housed at Totley.This site has a staff of 40 teachers for 450 students.
